info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:07AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi TX
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Nueces River Near Bluntzer affecting Jim Wells, San Patricio and Nueces Counties.
Nueces River Near Tilden affecting McMullen County.
San Fernando Creek Near Alice affecting Jim Wells County.
Aransas River Near Skidmore affecting Bee County.
For the Nueces River...including Cotulla, Tilden, Three Rivers, Mathis, Bluntzer, Calallen...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the San Fernando Creek...including Alice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Aransas River...including Skidmore...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Nueces River near Tilden.
* WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, The flooding of livestock, roads, irrigation pumps and tank batteries occurs. Fences and hunting cabins are damaged.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Saturday evening to 18.3 feet Sunday evening. It is forecast to fall but remain above flood stage until further notice. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
